name: Deploy JobTracker App (.NET + Angular)

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main  # or your default branch

env:
  AZURE_WEBAPP_PACKAGE_PATH: './'  # root folder

jobs:
  build-and-deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
    # Checkout code
    - name: Checkout code
      uses: actions/checkout@v4

    ### 1️⃣ SET UP ANGULAR ###
    - name: Set up Node.js
      uses: actions/setup-node@v4
      with:
        node-version: '18'

    - name: Install Angular dependencies
      working-directory: ./frontend
      run: npm install

    - name: Build Angular app
      working-directory: ./frontend
      run: npm run build -- --configuration production

    ### 2️⃣ DEPLOY ANGULAR TO AZURE ###
    - name: 'Deploy Angular to Azure Web App'
      uses: azure/webapps-deploy@v2
      with:
        app-name: ${{ secrets.AZURE_FRONTEND_WEBAPP_NAME }}
        slot-name: 'production'
        publish-profile: ${{ secrets.AZURE_CREDENTIALS }}
        package: ./frontend/dist/your-app-folder-name  # Replace with actual dist folder name

    ### 3️⃣ SET UP .NET BACKEND ###
    - name: Setup .NET Core
      uses: actions/setup-dotnet@v4
      with:
        dotnet-version: '8.0.x'

    - name: Restore .NET dependencies
      working-directory: ./backend
      run: dotnet restore

    - name: Build .NET backend
      working-directory: ./backend
      run: dotnet build --configuration Release

    - name: Publish .NET backend
      working-directory: ./backend
      run: dotnet publish -c Release -o publish

    ### 4️⃣ DEPLOY .NET BACKEND TO AZURE ###
    - name: Deploy .NET backend to Azure Web App
      uses: azure/webapps-deploy@v2
      with:
        app-name: ${{ secrets.AZURE_BACKEND_WEBAPP_NAME }}
        slot-name: 'production'
        publish-profile: ${{ secrets.AZURE_CREDENTIALS }}
        package: ./backend/publish
